cause.description:
This grass-roots christian charity brings practical support & empowering solutions to widows, orphans and vulnerable families whose lives have been devastated by poverty, HIV/AIDS in Zambia & Kenya.
www.thelifespringfoundation.org
We have started a school for orphans in Kaloko, a rural community in Zambia. We need volunteers to help!
You can donate online through our web address.
1. Empowerment through education
2. Opportunity to develop self-sufficiency skills
3. Regenerating rural communities through day centres
cause.name: The Lifespring Foundation (Africa)
